Module de.nicrizzos
Package de.nicrizzos.game.scenesystem

Class Battle

java.lang.Object
de.nicrizzos.game.scenesystem.SceneContent
de.nicrizzos.game.scenesystem.Battle
public class Battle
extends SceneContent
Represents a battle between the player and up to three enemies.

    • Battle

      public Battle​(Player _player, Enemy[] _enemies)
      Creates a new battle with up to three enemies.
      Parameters:
      _player - The player.
      _enemies - An array of enemies. Create a new enemy object for each enemy you want to use.

  • Method Details

    • enemyTurn

      public void enemyTurn()
      Allows enemies to perform actions; currently only lets them attack.

    • attack

      public void attack​(Entity defendant, int _damage)
      Lets entities attack one another.
      Parameters:
      defendant - The entity being attacked.
      _damage - The damage value to be dealt to the defendant.

    • isAnyEnemyAlive

      public boolean isAnyEnemyAlive()
      Checks if there is any enemy left alive in the battle.
      Returns:
      True, if there are enemies alive.

    • getReward

      public void getReward​(Player _player)
      Returns the rewards that should be passed onto the player. Currently, calculates XP values based on the enemies' stats.
      Parameters:
      _player - Add rewards to this player object.

    • getEnemy

      public Enemy getEnemy​(int enemyPosition) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Gets the enemy at the given position in the battle.
      Parameters:
      enemyPosition - A value between 0 and 2 (inclusive).
      Returns:
      The enemy at that position.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown whenever the function tries to evaluate values greater than 2 or smaller than 0.

    • getNumberOfEnemies

      public int getNumberOfEnemies()
      Returns:
      The number of enemies in the battle.

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer​(Player _player)
      Sets the player object to be used in this battle.
      Parameters:
      _player - Value

    • getChapterIndex

      public int getChapterIndex()
      Deprecated.
      Returns:
      The index of this battle in the overall chapter or scene.
